# useChat (hook)

## Import

```typescript
import { useChat } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" /%}

**Returns:**

{ send: ((message: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;) \| undefined; chatMessages: [ReceivedChatMessage](./core/receivedchatmessage.md)<!-- -->\[\]; isSending: boolean; }
